name: Exorcism Drum
description: A drum has an ancient history, it was named after an ancient beast. They have the same effect to Exorcism the bad and evil. If you hit it three times before you go to  sleep, you will have a good dream.
effect: Dmg to Demon monsters＋8%,Dmg received from Demon monster－8%

name: Expert Cook Chest III
description: With an insight into the taste of food, you can imagine the cooking process by tasting it. Now please try some more advanced dishes. (Open the pack to find 3-star food)

name: Expert Food Pack III
description: With an understanding of heat and taste, it is easier to handle ingredients and challenge more difficult ingredients. (Open the pack to find some intermediate food ingredients)

name: Expert Precision Stone
description: No weapon damage panelty based on monster size. Lasts for 15 min.
